hackathon-description-text: Come join us at Yammer's Happy Hacksgiving - a 24 -hour competition dedicated to building innovative enterprise applications on the Yammer Platform!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Nokia Lumia 920 and a Jawbone Jambox

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1355 Market Street, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How well does the application leverage the Yammer API?
How well does the application solve a real problem for end-users?
How easy is the application to use?

hackathon-location-address: 1355 Market Street, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA
